channel.title: Walking on water / wall hack
channel.description:
Heard someone used cheat engine to walk on water/pass any wall in runescape 2 days ago although they patched it today as it seems.. but yah no server side map tile checking all this time? pretty weak for runescape's standands.
[img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/4111/rs4j.jpg[/img]
maybe it was just clientsided map altering and nothing really changed with other player's map viewing but who knows.
Wondering if anyone can confirm this

item.title: Walking on water / wall hack
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The server will not allow you to walk through walls and stuff no matter what you send to it, it’s possible to make the client display anything you want though, so that’s all it was.

Read full topic

item.title: Walking on water / wall hack
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

It’ s prob map altering, the doomsayer isn’ t supposed to be that close to the water.

Read full topic

item.title: Walking on water / wall hack
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Its only client side. Im sure the servers are what processes the location of the player and you can make it look like wherever you want on your screen but it won’t do anything, because server side you haven’t changed position.

Read full topic

item.title: Walking on water / wall hack
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

thats not right, back when i had my updater i hooked the tiles and changed all of them to floor tiles and i still could not go past walls

Read full topic
